DOC.detailed_description: Seville orange juice inhibitor intestinal cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) 3A4 enzyme , one enzymes responsible metabolism colchicine . This study evaluate effect multiple daily consumption Seville orange juice pharmacokinetic profile single 0.6 mg dose colchicine . Twenty-four healthy , non-smoking , non-obese , non-pregnant adult volunteer age 18 45 give one dose colchicine ( 1 x 0.6 mg tablet ) Day 1 , overnight fast . Fasting continue 4 hour dose . Blood sample draw participant dose 24 hour post-dose adequately define baseline pharmacokinetics colchicine . After 14 day washout period , start morning Day 15 continue Day 17 , subject return clinic consumption administer 240 ml dose Seville orange juice morning evening . At 8am Day 18 overnight fast , subject receive co-administered single oral dose colchicine ( 1 x 0.6 mg ) Seville orange juice ( 1 x 240 ml ) . Fasting continue 4 hour dose . Blood sample draw participant dose 24 hour post-dose adequately define pharmacokinetics colchicine presence Seville orange juice . Subjects consume final administer 240 ml dose Seville orange juice even Day 18 . A goal study evaluate safety tolerability regimen healthy volunteer . Subjects monitor throughout participation study adverse reaction study drug and/or procedure . Seated blood pressure pulse measure prior dose approximately 1 , 2 , 3 hour follow drug administration Days 1 18 coincide peak plasma concentration colchicine . All adverse event whether elicited query , spontaneously report , observe clinic staff evaluate investigator report subject 's case report form .
